segments.text: I watch the woman as she polishes the plate absentmindedly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink behind her is a disaster with water pouring out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forming on the floor, soaking everything nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are exploiting her distraction perfectly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on the teetering stool, hand deep in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl anticipating her treat with arm extended.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But this setup screams potential tragedy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If the stool gives way, he'll crash down hard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: With the slippery floor from the water, it's even worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She might slip too if she steps back unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinet makes it all feel so precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hold my breath imagining the fall and the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone should yell to stop this before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
